main.description: Records a badge award to a user, project, or activity claim.

badge.description: Reference to the badge definition for this award.

subject.description: Entity the badge award is for (either an account DID or any specific AT Protocol record), e.g. a user, a project, or a specific activity claim.

note.description: Optional statement explaining the reason for this badge award.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
